raw_text: Predicate-Argument Model (SVO): A simple approach, used by Yangarber (2003) and Stevenson and Greenwood (2005), is to use subject-verb object tuples from the dependency parse as extraction patterns

Predicate-Argument Model (SVO): A simple approach, used by Yangarber et al (2000), Yangarber (2003) and Stevenson and Greenwood (2005), is to use subject-verb-object tuples from the dependency parse as extraction patterns
However, iterative learning algorithms, such as the ones used by Yangarber et al (2000) and Stevenson and Greenwood (2005), have not made use of these more complex extraction patterns
